description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
144 Hornsey Lane, Islington, London, N6 5NS

TPO Reference:
T4– Sycamore of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977 (T2 on the plans submitted).
T3– Horse Chestnut of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977 (T7 on the plans submitted).
T2– Sycamore of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977 (T8 on the plans submitted).

PO Number:
T090441

Work specifications:
1 x Sycamore (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977 (T2 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 6m above ground level.

1 x Horse Chestnut (T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977 (T7 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 6m above ground level.
Crown reduce by up to 25%.

1 x Sycamore (T2) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO Highview (No.2) 1977(T8 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 6m above ground level.
Crown reduce the height by up to 25%.
